entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 12:52 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.5°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -24.0°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
